name: DO MONSTERS LIE?
description:
Find out how the game is lying by completing the story.

A 2D platformer where you are an innocent kid who loves shooting and exploring and is very just.

Programmer, Designer, Artist and sound effects by Shreyansh Anchlia.
Background music by Vishal Bharadwaj.

This is our first Game Jam project made in 1 week. Sorry for not implementing the saving system and for any bugs that appear as these were not possible to be implemented due to time constraint.  This game will be updated and made even cooler after a while. 

This game will give you credit for exploration. Collect all 3 stones and explore the multiverse.

Thanks for playing. Any feedback/ rating would be appreciated.
